io.spine.core

Class Rejections

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.core.Rejections

  • public final class Rejections
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for working with rejections.

    • Field Summary

      static java.lang.String OUTER_CLASS_SUFFIX
      The name suffix for an outer class of generated rejection classes.

        Generates a RejectionId based upon a command ID in a format: 
         <commandId>-reject
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the command, which processing caused the rejection

        Parameters:

      • causedByRejection

        public static boolean causedByRejection(java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Verifies if the exception was caused by a command rejection.
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception to analyze
        Returns:
        true if the exception was created because of a command rejection thrown, false otherwise
